sx.blah.discord.api.internal

Class DiscordClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.blah.discord.api.internal.DiscordClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDiscordClient

    public final class DiscordClientImpl
extends Object
implements IDiscordClient
    Defines the client. This class receives and sends messages, as well as holds our user data.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The requests holder object.
      protected String token
      Our token, so we can send XHR to Discord.
      Map<IGuild,DiscordVoiceWS> voiceConnections
      Holds the active connections to voice sockets.
